Description: Body sherd (three joining fragments) of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery kernos with bases of three vessel holders and one leg; near rectangular body; white slip; interior and underside, friezes of vertical lines; outside, double guilloche; on top, two lines separating bands of rays and short strokes; at base of vessel holders, trace of tongue pattern above band and rising rays.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2179) (phase 2)
